FuncDef: This command enables the generation of the nas-port-id RADIUS attribute. Optionally, the value of this attribute (the SAP-id) can be prefixed by a fixed string and suffixed by the circuit-id or the remote-id of the client connection. If a suffix is configured, but no corresponding data is available, the suffix used is 0/0/0/0/0/0.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that a user configurable string be added to the RADIUS NAS port attribute, up to 8 characters.
Specifies the suffix type to be added to the RADIUS NAS port attribute. Values-circuit-id, remote-id.
